column4: I've got a good burn of a lucid cd, but on one computer only, I keep getting an "error reading disk" with error code 8042009 in the upper left corner.  anyone know what that is?
and the one computer more sensitive?
thanks. I'll be trying another disk - might be sensitive to defects. who knows?
Also check that you're using the right type of media, like DVD-R, DVD + R, CD etc.
